title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Blended Learning-Based Teacher Capacity Building for Digital Music Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Music Theory, Basic Digital Device Operation, and Understanding of DAW (Digital Audio Workstation) Concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Can explain a digital music creation system utilizing Ableton Live and Push controllers with over 90% accuracy.
Students can implement DAW-based composition and performance projects in a virtual simulation environment with over 80% completion accuracy.
Students can submit a digitally designed music education plan for blended learning models at least three times.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
